name: أشكال خاصة في خضم الفوضى
description:
[15-12-19]
Another part of my journey to study motion with Islamic Geometry. This time I built a grid with Trapcode Formᵀᴹ to randomly generate time offset on an animated sequence made from the sacred geometry inspired by the mosque in Samarra, Iraq
1080x1080 | 360 Frames | 24 FPS
